verses.text: PEA folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, Tu‘u, hiki mei heni, ‘a koe mo e kakai kuo ke ‘ohake mei ‘Isipite, ‘o ‘alu ki he fonua ‘a ia na‘a ku fuakava ai kia ‘Epalahame, ‘Aisake, mo Sēkope, ‘o pehē, Te u foaki ia ki ho hako:
pea te u tuku atu ha ‘āngelo ke taki ho‘omou ‘alu; (pea te u kapusi ‘a ha‘a Kēnani, mo ha‘a ‘Āmoli, mo ha‘a Heti, mo ha‘a Pēlisi, ‘a ha‘a Hevi, mo ha‘a Siepusi)
‘o a‘u ki he fonua ‘oku mahutafea ‘i he hu‘akau mo e honi: ka ‘e ‘ikai te u ‘alu hake au ‘i ho lotolotonga, he ko e kakai kia kekeva koe; na‘a ‘iloange te u faka‘auha koe ‘i he hala.
Pea ‘i he fanongo ‘a e kakai ki he ongoongo kovi ko ia, na‘a nau fetāngihi, pea na‘e ‘ikai ‘ai ‘e ha taha ‘ene teunga.

Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, Lea ki ha‘a ‘Isileli, ‘o pehē, Ko e kia kekeva kimoutolu: kapau te u ‘alu ‘i homou lotolotonga ko ha mōmeniti ‘e taha, te u faka‘auha koe: pea ko eni, hu‘ihu‘i ho‘o teunga, ka u vakai pe ko e hā te u fai kiate koe.
Pea na‘e vete ‘e ha‘a ‘Isileli ‘enau teunga mei he mo‘unga ko Hōlepi, ‘o fai atu.

Pea ko e anga ‘o Mōsese ke ‘ave ‘a e tēniti, ‘o fokotu‘u ‘i tu‘a ‘apitanga ‘o mama‘o atu; pea na‘a ne ui ia ko e Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga. Pea ka pehē, pea ‘ilonga ha taha na‘e kumi kia Sihova, na‘a ne ‘alu atu ki he Tēniti Fe‘iloaki‘anga, ‘a ia na‘e ‘i he tu‘a ‘apitanga.
Pea ka faifai pea me‘a ange ‘a Mōsese, ko e ‘alu ki he Tēniti, na‘e mālanga ki ‘olunga ‘a e kakai, ‘o tu‘u takitaha ‘i hono mata tēniti, ‘o mo‘u sio atu kia Mōsese, ‘o a‘u ki he‘ene hū ki he Tēniti.
Pea ka hū leva ‘a Mōsese ki he Tēniti, na‘e ‘alu hifo ‘a e Pou-‘ao ‘o tu‘u ‘i he mata tēniti, ‘o alea mo Mōsese.
Pea ka sio ‘e he kakai kotoa ki he tu‘u ‘a e Pou-‘ao ‘i he mata Tēniti, na‘a nau tutu‘u kotoa pē ‘o lotu, takitaha ‘i hono mata tēniti.

Pea ko e fefolofolai ‘a e ‘Eiki mo Mōsese na‘e fai ko e femātaaki, ‘o hangē ko e talanoa ‘a ha tangata mo hono kaume‘a. Pea na‘e foki ia ki he ‘apitanga, ka ko hono tauhi ko Siosiua ko e foha ‘o Nuni, ko e talavou, na‘e ‘ikai mahu‘i ia mei he Tēniti.

Pea fakatau folofola ‘a Mōsese kia Sihova, ‘o pehē; Vakai, kuo ke me‘a mai, ‘o pehē, Ke ke ‘ohake ‘a e kakai ni; ka kuo ‘ikai te ke fakahā mai pe ko hai te ke fekau ke ‘alu mo au: ka kuo ke folofola mai, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ou ‘ilo ho hingoa, pea ‘oku ou lelei‘ia ‘iate koe.
Pea ko eni, kapau mo‘oni kuo u ta‘imālie ‘ofa ‘i ho ‘ao, ke ke faka‘ilo mai mu‘a ho hala, ke u ‘ilo‘i koe; koe‘uhi ā ke u fakahōifua ‘a e ‘Afiona: ke ke me‘a foki ko e pule‘anga ni ko ho‘o kakai.
Pea folofola mai ‘e ia, Ko hoku Fōtunga ‘e ‘alu mo koe, pea te u fakamālōlō koe.
Pea ne fakatau folofola ange, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai ‘alu mo kimautolu ho Fōtunga, ‘oua ‘e ‘ohake kinautolu ‘i heni.

He ko e hā ‘e ‘ilo ai kuo hōifua ‘a e ‘Afiona kiate au, ‘a au mo ho‘o kakai? ‘ikai ko ‘etau ō pē? ‘A ē ‘oku mavahe ai kimautolu, ‘a au mo ho‘o kakai, mei he ngaahi fa‘ahinga kotoa pē ‘oku ‘i he funga ‘o e kelekele.
Pea folofola ‘a Sihova kia Mōsese, Te u fai mo e me‘a ko ia foki, ‘a ia kuo ke lea ki ai; he kuo u lelei‘ia ‘iate koe, pea ‘oku ou ‘ilo ho hingoa.
Pea pehē ‘e ia, ‘Oku ou kole, ke ke fakahā mai ho lāngilangi.

Pea ne folofola mai, Te u fakaholo atu ‘i ho ‘ao ‘a hoku ngaahi lelei kotoa pē; pea te u ‘a‘au kiate koe ‘a e hingoa ‘o e ‘Eiki; pea te u ‘ofa kiate ia ‘a ia te u ‘ofa ki ai, pea te u fakamolemole ‘a ia te u fakamolemolea.
Pea folofola mai ia, ‘E ‘ikai te ke lava ke sio ki hoku mata; he ‘oku ‘ikai ha tangata te ne sio ki hoku mata, pea mo‘ui.
Pea folofola mai ‘a e ‘Eiki, Ko eni, ‘oku ai ha potu ofi mai; pea te ke tu‘u ‘i he funga makatu‘u:
pea ka faifai pea fakaholo atu hoku lāngilangi, te u ‘ai koe ki ha ava ‘o e makatu‘u, pea te u ‘ufi‘ufi koe ‘aki hoku ‘aofi nima, kae‘oua kuo u ‘alu atu;
pea te u toki to‘o hoku nima, pea te ke mamata ki hoku tu‘a: ka ko hoku mata e ‘ikai te ke sio ki ai.
